issue.title: Golang compilation error
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13019](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13019). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
../../go/pkg/mod/github.com/apache/arrow/go/arrow@v0.0.0-20210609023311-39dcb43dd26d/datatype_extension.go:70:26: registry.LoadAndDelete undefined (type \*sync.Map has no field or method LoadAndDelete)

 

go version go1.14.6 darwin/amd64

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13019?focusedCommentId=17360019) by Pantelis Karatzas (pantelispanka):*
Compiles on updated golang version
